alert.note: Alert for Antrim; Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet; Otsego; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 03 at 5:25AM EDT by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Presque Isle, Cheboygan, northwestern Otsego, Antrim, southern Emmet and Charlevoix Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 525 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mullet Lake to near Omena. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Indian River, Mullet Lake and Topinabee around 530 AM EDT. Aloha around 535 AM EDT. Aloha State Park and Alverno around 540 AM EDT. Koehler Township around 545 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Central Lake, Black Lake, Onaway State Park, Clam River, Tower, Bellaire, Onaway and Huron Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Antrim; Charlevoix; Cheboygan; Emmet; Otsego; Presque Isle
